title: Snow cat: based on the book by Dayal Kaur Khalsa
creator_credit: Snow Cat Productions, ONF | NFB, Sheldon Cohen, Kenneth Hirsch and Marcy Page
brief_description: On a cold snowy afternoon, a grandmother captivates her granddaughter’s attention with the tale of a lonely girl and a magic cat. A story of enduring love by artist and filmmaker Sheldon Cohen, recipient of many prestigious prizes, including the British Academy Award. In ‘Snow cat’ he works collaboratively with animator Jeami, who designed an original finger-paint technique for the film.
